reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, well-made, and incredibly soft, with one noting it's not scratchy or itchy like most knitted pieces. They appreciate its versatility as a perfect summer piece that can be dressed up or down, and like its vibrant colors. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some love the batwing style and find it true to size, others say it's too boxy for their body type and recommend sizi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Layering, stylish and cozy!
items.body: I absolutely love this Viottiset batwing short sleeve sweater! The knit is thick and high-quality, perfect for layering in the fall or even for a chilly spring day. The mock neck gives it a chic touch and the loose fit makes it very flattering on different body types. I wore it with skinny jeans and boots and got so many compliments. It’s cozy without being too warm, and the color is super versatile. Highly recommend if you want something stylish yet effortless! Read more
items.author: María Yélamo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Comfortable
items.body: This sweater is so cute and versatile! The batwing sleeves give it a relaxed, trendy vibe, and the mock turtleneck is super flattering. It’s soft and cozy without being too heavy — perfect for layering during chilly fall days. I wore it with jeans and ankle boots, and got so many compliments. Great quality, true to size, and perfect for both casual and dressed-up looks. Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Liberna Aguillon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s pretty ok
items.body: Super cute but a little itchy Read more
items.author: Diana Chase

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy this!
items.body: This is a great sweater! It looks really classy. Great for winter, spring and fall. I wear it at every opportunity. Nice weight Read more
items.author: judy Goodwin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering
items.body: I really wanted to like this sweater. The material is soft and the quality of it is great. When I put it on it doesn’t hang right. It fits great if a little baggy but I like that look. When you get to the bottom it curls in making it puff out around the pant line. Read more
items.author: DT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering, oversized fit
items.body: I love the oversized fit of this sweater. This is perfect to wear in the summer on a chilly night and go into fall with it. It’s made very well and is super soft. I also really like the tan color. Read more
items.author: Audrey

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, washes terribly
items.body: Loved the look and feel, the fit was great but after one wash it is falling apart. Read more
items.author: Leticia Minjares

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooo comfy!
items.body: Love this! Soft, chunky knit sweater. Yarn will pull easily, you can rethread it. Great quality for the price! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Apricot Stripe, Blue Stripe, White Stripe, Fluorescent Green, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black, Agate Green, Khaki, Gray Stripe, Black Stripe, Sapphire Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
